name: Epic Cheese Steak Crostini Sandwich
preparation: Preheat oven to 450° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
In a sauté pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Season steak with salt and pepper, to taste, if desired. Cook steak about 3–4 min, or until desired doneness. Remove from pan and set aside to rest.
Meanwhile, slice bell peppers and onion into thin strips. Place in pan; add vinegar and dressing mix. Cover; cook until tender, about 4 min.
In a Prep Bowl, combine butter and aioli mix. Split rolls in two and brush with garlic butter. Place on Sheet Pan and toast about 3–4 min.
Meanwhile, slice steak against the grain.
Evenly divide steak and veggies between toasted roll halves. Place on Sheet Pan, sprinkle with cheese and heat in oven until cheese is melted, about 1 min.
tips: Make it vegetarian: Swap beef for smoked tofu, sliced.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!

products.name: Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix
summary: A creamy roasted garlic condiment for your burger, sandwich or use as a dip for fries or veg.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
